python based access to Thunderbird mail

Installation
============
```bash
pip install pyThunderbird
```

Get Sources
===========
```bash
git clone https://github.com/WolfgangFahl/pyThunderbird
cd pyThunderbird
scripts/install
```

Testing
=======
```bash
scripts/test
```
